column1: Déorwine was the Chief of the Kings Riders during the War of the Ring.

column2: Déorwine and six of his knights were slain at the Battle of the Pelennor Fields.

column1: The name Déorwine probably means "brave-friend" in Old English
2012: The Lord of the Rings Online: Riders of Rohan:

column2: but currently plays no role in the storyline.
